name: Trusty Treasure Recovery Co.
description:
Well met, apprentice! 'Tis thy first day at Trusty Treasure Recovery Co. Work diligently, pilot thy airship with utmost care, and bring back many valuable trinkets.

Made over 72 hours as part of an unofficial game jam with friends. My goal was to make a game that used the physics engine for the main gameplay mechanic. 🎈

Credits:

Bell sounds: Hansjörg Malthaner http://opengameart.org/users/varkalandar Click sounds: StarNinjas https://opengameart.org/users/starninjas Epic Annulet sound: CosmicD https://freesound.org/people/CosmicD/ "Well Done" sound: Copyright 2013 by Iwan Gabovitch <qubodup.net> Hook sound: Impact by Iwan 'qubodup' Gabovitch http://opengameart.org/users/qubodup
